definition: a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area, make a tour of a certain place
details:
noun
- a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area
= example: a journey or route all the way around a particular place or area
= synonyms: circuit
- a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
= synonyms: turn
- a period of time spent in military service
= synonyms: hitch
verb
- make a tour of a certain place
= example: make a tour of a certain place
